name: GameScope- Precision Video Game Optic System
blurb: Gamescope is a military grade optical magnifying scope for first person shooter games which revolutionizes the concept of FPS strategy.

rewards.reward: Our eternal gratitude, and a listing on our backers page at fearthescope.com, and a cool GameScope sticker (intl buyers, please add $2 for shipping).

A single GameScope, (either the Assault, CQB, Sniper or Support reticle), and the mounting kit shipped direct to you. This will make you one of the first non-testers to receive the system. Rack up some headshots before your friends know what hit them!\r\n\r\nInternational backers, please add $5 for shipping.
The full GameScope system; you get all 4 GameScopes (Assault, Sniper, CBQ  & Support), and the mounting system.
This is the real deal. 4 GameScopes (Assault, Sniper, CQB & Support), the mounting system, and a cool GameScope tee shirt (pictures coming soon).
All 4 GameScopes (Assault, Sniper, CQB & Support), the mounting system, and a "Fear The Scope" "headshot hoodie" featuring the GameScope logo and a printed on "headshot" entry wound on the hood!
This gets you everything! All 4 lenses, the mounting system, the tee shirt, the hoodie and the stickers.

The Clan Pack:
10x GameScopes with either a standard reticle or a custom design featuring your clan, business or club logo/motto, plus 10x GameScope t-shirts with your Clan or Business featured on the front.

Get your friends and clan to pitch in and score 10 custom scopes. Although we'll be doing custom scope designs in the future, this will be your only opportunity to rack up some custom gear in 2012.

The Big Clan Pack:
For the serious clans, you'll get 20x GameScopes with either a standard reticle or a custom design featuring your clan, business or club logo/motto, plus 20x GameScope t-shirts with your Clan or Business featured on the front.

Show your enemies who's boss with 20 custom scopes. We'll be doing custom scope designs in early 2013, but this will be your opportunity to be one of the first in the world with a custom pack.

The Retail Pack:
Perfect for video game stores, comics & game shops, trade shows vendors, conventions, and any other place gamers gather.

This is an awesome deal. You get 100 GameScopes, 10 GameScope tee shirts, and 50 GameScope stickers. 

At a suggested retail price of $16 per scope, and $15 per tee, you're picking up over $1,750 worth of merch plus free stickers!

The Mega-Retail Pack:
This package is perfect for shops with multiple locations, or large sales volumes.

You get 250 GameScopes, 20 tee shirts, 10 hoodies, 100 stickers, and, as an added bonus, we'll list your shop or business on our site as as authorized distributor of the GameScope for the next 12 months. We'll include your contact info, URL and a brief blurb about your shop or business.

But that's not all! We'll also front load you on the distribution list so that you get your scopes and swag before anyone else! You'll be the first shop in your state (heck, maybe your entire region) with GameScopes in stock for this holiday retail season.
